title: Eufloria
notes: There is a Eufloria HD with Native Linux Client

title: Eufloria
notes: The log ends with a "pid 2544 != 2543, skipping destruction (fork without exec?)" and I have no idea of what is this, but I think the game is only playable in a 32 bits prefix because, as stated in WineHQ, we've ""to copy msvcr90.dll und msvcm90.dll into the system32 folder and run 'winetricks dotnet20 vcrun2008' "" in the game's wine prefix. https://appdb.winehq.org/objectManager.php?sClass=version&iId=18490&iTestingId=47265
